content: I think I'll write the answers in a separate document, at least to start with. That way, I can really focus on getting into my character's head without worrying about fitting it into the story just yet. I might even try to do a few interviews with different characters to see how they interact with each other. Speaking of which, I've been meaning to work on my dialogue skills, so this exercise could be a great way to practice that as well. Do you have any tips on writing realistic dialogue?
